GSP33brsgor4u:7: sādhanaṃ nirūpya phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayorhatuphalabhāvaṃ saṃgatimāha-tṛtīya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:9: pūrvaṃ sākṣādeva śrutyuktaṃ saṃnyāsādi sādhanaṃ cintitaṃ, saṃprati phalārthāpattigamyamāvṛttyādikamadyāśleṣādhikaraṇātprāk
GSP33brsgor4u:10: tadārabhya jīvanmuktistato dvitīyapāde utkrāntistṛtīye arcirādimārgasya gantavyasya ca nirṇayaścaturthe jñānopāsanayoḥ phalanirṇaya iti pādārthavivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:15: mokṣe viśeṣābhāvavacchravaṇādāvāvṛttiviśeṣo nāstīti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvāntarasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:16: atra pūrva pakṣe śravaṇādeḥ prayājavadadṛṣṭārthatvātsakṛdanuṣṭhānaṃ phalaṃ, siddhānte tvavaghātavaddṛṣṭārthatvādyāvatphalamāvṛttiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:22: tathāpi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭamātrakalpanānupapatteḥ śravaṇāderāvṛttidvārā sākṣātkāraphalasya ṣaḍjādau dṛṣṭatvādasakṛduktirāvṛttiṃ sūcayati dṛṣṭārthatvāditi nyāyānugrahādityāha-na darśanaparyavasānatvāditi dhyānasya tvāvṛttervedopāsīteti śabde śrutatvānna
GSP33brsgor4u:26: sa raikvo yadveda tatprāṇatattvaṃ raikvādanyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidveda tatphale
GSP33brsgor4u:27: sarvamantarbhavatītyetadukte itthaṃ mayotkṛṣṭatvena sa raikva ukta iti haṃsaṃ prati haṃsāntaravacanaṃ, tacchrutvā raikvaṃ gatvovāca jānaśrutiḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:28: he bhagavaḥ, etāṃ raikvaviditāṃ devatāṃ me 'nuśādhi mahyamupadiśetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:29: evaṃ saguṇanirguṇasākṣātkārasādhanadhyānasyāvṛttiḥ śrautī cārthasiddhā ca dṛṣṭārthatvāt, śravaṇamananayostvasakṛdupadeśādarthasiddhaivāvṛttiriti viśeṣaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:34: kauṣītakiḥ putramuvāca, atastvaṃ tathā mākṛthāḥ kintu bahūn raśmīnādityaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:41: vākyaṃ nirguṇasākṣātkārajanane śaktaṃ na vā, ādye sakṛcchrutavākyātsākṣātkārasiddherāvṛttirvṛthetyuktvā
GSP33brsgor4u:47: tayoḥ parokṣajñānahetutvasvābhāvyādāvṛttāvapi na sākṣātkāraḥ syāditi pariharati-nāsakṛdapīti
GSP33brsgor4u:55: yathā ṣaḍjādisvarabhedasākṣātkāraśaktamapi śrotramabhyāsamapekṣate tathā brahmātmasākṣātkāraśaktaṃ vākyaṃ tadapekṣamityanubhavamāśrityāha-nahi
GSP33brsgor4u:59: āropitāṃśanirāsāya na me deho nendriyamityabhyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:67: duḥkhādayo nātmadharmāḥ dṛśyatvāddehādivat, nāpyātmasvarūpāḥ ātmani satyapyananuvṛttitvādvyatirekeṇa caitanyavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:68: nirduḥkhe cidātmani duḥkhādidhiyo bhrāntitvādvākyārthānubhavo na virudhyata ityāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brsgor4u:69: anubhave jāte 'pyāvṛttyādyanuṣṭhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na caivamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:70: ratiḥ kāmaḥ ātmakāmatayā tṛptirviṣayatṛṣṇākṣayaḥ tena saṃtoṣe ātmānandānubhava iti bhedaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:71: nanvāvṛttau niyogātpravṛttirvācyā tathā ca niyuktatvabuddherakartrātmadhīrna syādityata āha-tatrāpīti
GSP33brsgor4u:81: pūrvatra dhyānāderāvṛttiruktā tāmupajīvya tattvajñānārthaṃ dhyānāvṛttikāle kimahaṃ brahmeti dhyātavyamuta matsvāmīśvara ityaikyabhedamānābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-ya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:86: abhedaśrutīnāṃ gauṇatvamukhyatve ubhayatra phalaṃ, yadyapyayaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhaparihāro dvitīyādhyāyasaṃgatastathāpyaikyaśruteraviruddhatvaniścayasya samādhāvantaraṅgatvādiha saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:88: kiñca kimīśvarasya jīvamātratvamaikyaṃ jīvasyeśvaramātratvaṃ veti vikalpya krameṇa dūṣayati-īśvarasya cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:92: abhedaśrutīnāṃ phalavadapūrvārthatātparyeṇa gauṇatvāyogādbhedaśrutīnāṃ kalpitabhedānuvāditvātpratyakṣāderapi tadviṣayatvādvimbapratibimbayoriva viruddhadharmāṇāṃ mithyātvānmukhyamaikyamiti siddhānyayati-evamityādinā īśvarasya jīvatvaṃ na pratipādyaṃ yeneśvarābhāvaḥ syātkintu jīvasyeśvaratvam /
GSP33brsgor4u:96: varṇeṣu kramasvarayorabhāvādupalabdhadhvanisthayorāropo vācyastathā cāropitakramasvaraviśiṣṭavarṇātmakavedasya mithyātvaṃ durvāraṃ, vādināṃ satyatvāgrahastvavidyāvijṛmbhita iti vedasatyatvābhāvo na doṣa ityāha-neti
GSP33brsgor4u:109: yathā brahmaṇyabhedasattavādahaṅgraha ukta evaṃ pratīkeṣvapi brahmavikāratayā jīvābhinnabrahmābhinnatvājjīvābhedasattvenāhaṅgrahaḥ kārya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:118: vikārasya brahmaṇā svarūpaikyāyogādbādhenaikyaṃ vācyaṃ pratīkabādhe copāstividhirna syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:120: tathāca bādhamūlabrahmaikyajñānaṃ dvārīkṛtya pratīkeṣvahaṅgrahopāstikalpanā na yuktā, bādhavirodhādityāha-naca brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:121: ato jīvapratīkayoḥ svarūpabhedādahaṅgrahe vidhyaśravaṇācca nāhaṅgraha iti
GSP33brsgor4u:123: yathā rucakasvastikayoḥ suvarṇātmanaikye 'pi mitho naikyaṃ tathā
GSP33brsgor4u:125: yadica dharmivyatirekeṇa tayorabhāvaniścayādvastvaikyaṃ tadopāsanoccheda ukta ityarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:139: ataḥ pariśeṣādadhyāsa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyakāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmakābhāvātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:142: atra vikāradṛṣṭibhirbrahmopāstisiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā
GSP33brsgor4u:143: brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
GSP33brsgor4u:144: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:145: kiñca prathamaśrutānāmādityādipadānāmasaṃjātavirodhitayā mukhyārthatvagraho nyāyyaḥ, brahmaśabde ca dṛṣṭilakṣaṇāgrahaḥ, tathā cādityādayo brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā ityeva vākyārtha ityāha-prāthamyācceti brahmaśabdasyaiva dṛṣṭyarthatve hetvantaramāha-itiparatvāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:146: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:151: kiñca yaddṛṣṭyā vikārasyotkarṣaḥ tasya brahmaṇo viśeṣaṇatve 'pyupāsyatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:158: tairevādiriti upadrava iti ca bhaktidvayādhikaiḥ saptāṃśa sāmeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:162: siddharūpādityādibhyaḥ karmarūpodgīthādīnāṃ phalasaṃnikarṣeṇotkarṣādbrahmavadviśeṣaṇatve niyama iti dṛṣṭāntena mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor4u:167: dhyānaṃ vihitaṃ, tatra yadi ṛksāmātmakayoḥ karmāṅgayoḥ pṛthivyagnidṛṣṭhiḥ syāt, tadā pṛthivyagnyorṛksāmapadaprayogo na syādityatra
GSP33brsgor4u:174: upāstīnāṃ hi karmasamṛddhiḥ phalaṃ śrūyate, sā ca tābhiraṅgeṣu
GSP33brsgor4u:176: nanu yatropāstīnāṃ prakṛtakarmāpūrvasaṃnikṛṣṭāṅgadvārāpekṣaṃ phalaṃ śrutaṃ tatra phalopapattaye 'ṅgānāmupāsyatvaṃ bhavatu tadanapekṣalokādiphaleṣu tūpāsaneṣu kathamupāsyaviveka iti śaṅkate-bhavatviti yathā svatantrapaśuphalasyāpi godohanasya aṅgadvārāpekṣayaiva phalamiṣṭaṃ tadvallokādiphaleṣūpāsaneṣvapi karmāpūrvāṅgadvāraiva phalakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsgor4u:184: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
GSP33brsgor4u:189: agnirmāṇavaka ityatrāgniniṣṭhaśucitvādiguṇavattvarūpaparamparāsaṃbandhena lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭā, tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi
GSP33brsgor4u:191: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā, kṣatṛpadasya rājanyaprayogāditi śaṅkate-tatra yadyapīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:192: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt, ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:194: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:195: kṣattā sūtaḥ, tasya kāryaṃ rathacaryādi yadā rājeva karoti tadā kṣattṛśabdo rājanyapyastītyakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:198: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:199: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:203: pañcavidhasyopāsanam'ityupasaṃhṛtya, atheti saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanaṃ prakramya prapañcitamataḥ sāmna evopāsyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:205: yadyapi hiṅkāroddeśena pṛthivītvavidheruddeśyasya prathamanirdeśo vācyastathāpyuktanyāyabalādvyatyayo grāhya ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brsgor4u:210: karmaṇa utthitenopaviṣṭena vānekadhānuṣṭhānadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ karmāṅgāśritopāsanānāmāsananiyamānapekṣāṇāmanuṣṭhānaprakāra uktastadvadaṅgānāśritopāsaneṣvapyaniyama iti pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor4u:211: atrāsanābhyāsāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tu manodehayorbhinnatve 'pi dehacāñcalye manaso 'navasthānasya anubhavasiddhatvānmanovyāpāreṣūpāsaneṣu dehasthairyārthamāsananiyamāpekṣeti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:224: brahmasya śārīrasya cāsanasya smaraṇānniyama ityāha-smaranti ceti //10//
GSP33brsgor4u:229: teṣvevāṅgānāśritopāsaneṣu prācyādidiśi tīrthādideśe pradoṣādikāle niyamo 'sti na vetyubhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:230: ekaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatirūpāstīnāṃ vihitatvādyāgādivadasti digādiniyama iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:235: prācīnapravaṇe prāgdeśe nimnasthāne vaiśvadevaṃ kuryāditivadatra digādiviśeṣo na śrūyate ato 'numānamaprayojakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:240: vācanikaṃ samadeśādiniyamamaṅgīkṛtya cittaikāgryaviruddheṣu deśādigateṣu prācīnapravaṇatvādiṣvanādara iti suhṛdbhāvena sūtrakṛdupadiśati /
GSP33brsgor4u:251: upāstīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ cāntyakāle prāptavyaphalasphūrtidvārā phalahetutve mānamāha-savijñāna iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:252: bhāvanāmayaṃ vijñānaṃ phalasphuraṇaṃ tena sahitaḥ savijñāno vijñānasphuritaphalaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:253: yasmiṃlloke cittaṃ saṃkalpo 'syeti yaccittastena saṃkalpitena lokena saha phalasphūrtyanantaraṃ manaḥ prāṇe līyate iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:257: astvidamantyaphalaṃ vijñānaṃ karmaṇamivādṛṣṭadvāropāstīnāṃ tataḥ kuta āmaraṇamāvṛttirityata āha-pratyayāstviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:267: yathopāsakānāṃ yāvajjīvaṃ kartavyamasti na tathātmavidāmiti karmakṣayalakṣaṇāṃ jīvanmuktimāha-tadadhigama iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:269: saṃprati phalādhyāyasthā phalacintā kriyata ityāha-gata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:270: karmaṇāṃ phalāntatvaśāstrājjñānanāśyatvaśāstrācca saṃśayaḥ, pūrvapakṣe jñānino 'pi saṃcitapāpabhogānantaraṃ muktiḥ, siddhānte tu jñānasamakālaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:274: ataḥ phalāntameva pāpaṃ na madhye naśyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:275: nanu tarhi tannāśārthaṃ prāyaścittavidhirna syāditi cet /
GSP33brsgor4u:277: yathā āhitāgnergṛhadāhe nimitte sati 'agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet'iti iṣṭividhistadvaddoṣe nimittamātre sati
GSP33brsgor4u:279: nanu viṣama upanyāsaḥ, yuktaṃ gṛhadāhasya siddhatvādayogyatvāccāphalatayā
GSP33brsgor4u:280: nimittamātratvaṃ doṣavānprāyaścittaṃ kuryādityatra tu malinaḥ snāyāditivaddoṣapadasya nivṛttidvārā phalaparatvasaṃbhavāt 'tarati
GSP33brsgor4u:292: vidhiniṣedhaśāstraṃ 'nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate'ityādi, smṛtiśca karmaṇaḥ phalaśaktau pramāṇamataḥ śaktasyāpi kutaścinnāśāṅgīkāreṇa śāstravirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:306: jñānātpuṇyaṃ kṣīyate na veti pūrvavatsaṃdehe jñānaṃ tu na puṇyanāśakaṃ śāstrīyatvātpuṇyavadityadhikāśaṅkāmuktvātideśaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:308: nanu kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutiḥ pāpaviṣayā sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taratīti viśeṣaśruterityata āha-yatrāpi kevala iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:314: uktakarmakṣayaṃ viṣayīkṛtya kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutestasya tāvadeva ciramiti śruteśca saṃśayamāha-pūrvayoriti
GSP33brsgor4u:316: pūrvasiddhāntanyāyena pūrvapakṣaprāptau uktotsargataḥ karmakṣatiḥ prārabdhānyakarmaviṣayetyapavādaṃ siddhānyati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:318: prārabdhādyāvanna vimucyate tāvāneva vilambastanmokṣe brahma saṃpadyata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:319: dehapātāvadhiliṅgāttattvavidāṃ yājñavalkyādīnāṃ dehadhāraṇaśrutismṛtiliṅgācca prārabdhakarmaṇastattvajñānaṃ prati hetutvenopajīvyatvācca prābalyasiddhestatpratibaddhaṃ tattvajñānaṃ tatsiddhyarthamavidyāṃśaṃ vikṣepaśaktyākhyaṃ vihāyāvarakāvidyāṃśaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:327: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ karma jñānānnaśyati na veti saṃdehe ubhe puṇyapāpe taratītyaviśeṣaśruternaśyatītyāśaṅkyottarasyāpītyuktātideśasya nityādyatiriktakāmyapuṇyaviṣayatvenātrāpavādaṃ siddhāntayati-puṇyasyetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:330: atra bhāṣye jñānakarmaṇoḥ sākṣādekakāryatvaṃ paramatenoktvā sākṣātpāramparyābhyāṃ mokṣahetutvaṃ svamatamuktamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:332: nirguṇavidyāyāḥ karmasāhityaṃ tṛptiṃ prati bhojanasya lāṅgaleneva
GSP33brsgor4u:338: yatprārabdhādanyatkāmyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca tadeva vidvatsuhṛddviṣatoḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ karma janayati svayaṃ ca jñānānnaśyatīti bhāvaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:345: atra pūrvapakṣe karmāṅgopāstihīnakarmaṇo jñānārthatvāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti bhedaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:346: bhavatu vidyāviśiṣṭasya karmaṇo jñānaṃ prati śīghrakāritvākhyaḥ kaścidatiśayo vidyāsāmarthyāt
GSP33brsgor4u:348: naca tatra śrutau yajñādiśabdānāṃ vidyopetakarmaparatayā saṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:350: 'yadeva vidyayā'iti śrutiḥ kevalasyāpi vīryavattvaṃ gamayatīti siddhāntagranthārthaḥ //18//
GSP33brsgor4u:355: tattvavidatra viṣayaḥ, sa kiṃ prārabdhakṣayānantaraṃ saṃsaratyuta neti nimittabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye siddhāntamupakramate-anārabdheti /
GSP33brsgor4u:360: yattu saṃcitaṃ karmāntaraṃ tanna nimittaṃ phalasya, dagdhamūlatvāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:361: avidyādayo hi kleśāḥ karmaṇastatphalasya ca mūlam /
GSP33brsgor4u:362: taduktaṃ yogaśāstre 'kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ sati mūle tādvipākaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:363: tacca mūlaṃ jñānāgninā dagdhamiti kutaḥ punaḥ saṃsārastasmāddehapāte kaivalyamiti siddham
GSP33brsgor4u:366: // iti caturthasyādhyāya jīvanmukti nirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsgor4u:379: pūrvapakṣe karaṇānāṃ svarūpalayānmṛtamātrasya muktiḥ, siddhānte tu saṃsārasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:382: uttaratra hi sūtrakṛttattvavida indriyāṇāṃ svarūpalayaṃ vakṣyati tadbalādihādhyāhāra ucitaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:384: prakṛtāveva vikāralaya iti nyāyaviruddhārthaṃ śrutirapi na brūta iti siddhāntayati-atatprakṛtitvāditi
GSP33brsgor4u:385: nyāyasya niravakāśatvādbalīyastvaṃ śabdasya tūktirvāgitivyutpattyā lakṣaṇayā vā sāvakāśatvamiti dyotayituṃ śabdāccetyuktam //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:392: sarvendriyavṛttilayaścediṣṭastarhi vāṅmanasīti pṛthaksūtraṃ kimarthamityata āha-sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāmiti
GSP33brsgor4u:399: kṛtaḥ iha tvabātmakaprāṇasya annātmakamanaḥprakṛtitvena prakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugrahānna manaḥśrutirbādhyeti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ pūrvavat, siddhāntastvabannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāve 'pi na tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasostadbhāvo himaghaṭayorapi tadbhāvaprasaṅgādato
GSP33brsgor4u:401: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi
GSP33brsgor4u:411: śruterūpagamādiśruteśca saṃśayamuktvā jīve layaṃ vināpi upagamādisaṃbhava iti pūrvapakṣayati-sthitamityādinā
GSP33brsgor4u:412: atra tejaḥśabdasya mukhyatvaṃ, siddhānte tu bhūtopahita jīvalakṣakatvamiti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-sa prakṛta ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:414: taṃ jīvaṃ prati prāṇānāmupagamānugamanāvasthānaśrutibhya iti hetvarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:415: yathā yātrecchāvantaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyā upagacchantyevameva paralokaṃ jigamiṣuṃ jīvaṃ sarve prāṇā abhimukhyenāyāntītyupagamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:418: jīvasya prāptavyaphalāvagamāya hi vijñānasāhityaśrutyāḥ mukhyaprāṇasahitakaraṇānāṃ jīve sthitirbhātītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:422: yadyapi prāṇasya tejasyavyavadhānena layaḥ śrutastathāpyubhayaśrutyanugrahāya prāṇo jīve līyate, jīvadvārā ca tadupādhiṣu tejaādibhūteṣviti śrutyarthasphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ sūtraṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:424: naca layaṃ vināpi jīvaṃ pratyipagamādisaṃbhavāttejaḥ śrutirmukhyāstviti
GSP33brsgor4u:425: vācyaṃ, jīvaṃ pratyāgatya prāṇasya nirvyāpāratvena sthiterevātra layatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:433: aṇvyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ, mīyanta iti mātrāḥ paricchinnāḥ, prāṅmokṣādavināśinyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:434: daśārdhānāṃ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmabhāgā iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:441: evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇāṃ manasi prathamaṃ vṛttilayalābhāttato manovṛtteḥ prāṇe layaḥ prāṇavṛtterbhūtopahitajīve laya ityutkrāntivyavasthoktā /
GSP33brsgor4u:447: tato 'nūtkrānta upāsako muktimaśnuta iti phalaṃ, siddhānte tūtkrānto brahmalokabhāgīti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:450: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantīti pratiṣedho 'pi tadviṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:452: sṛtirmārgastasyopakramo 'rciḥprāptistataḥ prāktanā utkrāntistulyā, tata upāsako mūrdhanyanāḍīdvārārcirādimārgaṃ prāpnoti nānya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:454: tadāpekṣikameva na mukhyaṃ 'yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'sya saṃkalpādeva
GSP33brsgor4u:461: pūrvodāhṛtotkrāntivākyaśeṣaṃ vyākhyāya liṅgāśrayapañcabhūtānāṃ kimātyantiko brahmaṇi laya utānātyantika iti layasyobhayathādarśanātsaṃśayamāha-kīdṛśī punariyamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:462: pūrvatrāpekṣikamamṛtatvamityuktaṃ tadayuktamityākṣepātsaṃgatiḥ pūrvapakṣe mṛtamātrasya muktisiddhiḥ, siddhānte tu karmavidyāśāstrabalātsāvaśeṣalayasiddhiriti vivekaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor4u:466: nanu liṅgātmakasya tejasaḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmatamanāḍīdvārā gatiḥ kuto vā kenacinmūrtena pratighāto nāsti kuto vā na dṛśyata ityata āha-sūkṣmamiti
GSP33brsgor4u:483: ātmakāmatvāt pūrṇānandātmavittvādāptakāmaḥ prāptaparamānandaḥ, ato niṣkāmaḥ anabhivyaktāntaravāsanātmakakāmaśūnyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:485: jñānina utkrāntirasti na veti pañcamīṣaṣṭhīśrutibhyāṃ saṃdehe siddhāntiśaṅkānirāsapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-netyādinā //12//
GSP33brsgor4u:490: kāṇvaśrutau tāvattasyeti sarvanāmnā prakṛtaṃ jñāninaṃ parāmṛśya saṃbandhasāmānyamuktaṃ tatra mādhyandinaśākhāyāṃ tasmādityapādānatvarūpaviśeṣa ukto grāhyastathāca jīvātprāṇotkrāntipratiṣedho bhāti na dehāttacchabdena dehasyānuktestasmājjñānino 'pyutkrāntirastīti jñānavaiyarthyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalam /
GSP33brsgor4u:495: yeṣāṃ pañcamīpāṭhasteṣāṃ yadyapi dehinaḥ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi dehadehinorabhedāttasmāditi dehaṃ parāmṛśya tadāpādana evotkrāntipratiṣedha iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:501: ato vidvatsaṃbandhiprāṇānāmutkrāntyapādānāpekṣāyāṃ cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhnovetyuktadehapradeśā eva grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:502: tathācāyamarthaḥ-tasya viduṣo bhogopakaraṇātmakāḥ prāṇāḥ dehapradeśebhyo notkrāmantīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:503: evaṃ ca prāptotkrāntiniṣedhārthatvaṃ vākyasyeti sarvaṃ caturasram /
GSP33brsgor4u:505: samyagātmabhāvena bhūtāni paśyataḥ apadasya prāpyapadarahitasya padaiṣiṇo devā api mārge muhyanti mārgaṃ na jānanti tadabhāvāditi smṛtiyojanā /
GSP33brsgor4u:514: pūrvatra gatiniṣedhena vidvatkalānāṃ ghrāṇādīnāmatraiva laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:515: tamupajīvya sa kiṃ tattatkalāprakṛtiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu syāduta paramātmanīti śrutidvayadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:516: tatra sākṣātprakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugṛhītayā 'gatāḥ kalāḥ'iti
GSP33brsgor4u:518: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya līyante evamevāsya paritaḥ sarvatra brahmadraṣṭurimāḥ prāṇaśraddhādyāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣe kalpitāḥ puruṣameva jñeyaṃ prāpya layaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:522: vastugatyā vidvaddṛṣṭyā paramātmani kalālaye 'pi lokadṛṣṭyā pratiṣṭhāsu layoktiraviruddhā
GSP33brsgor4u:523: tathāca kalāḥ svaprakṛtiṣu vilāpya tābhiḥ saha puruṣe līyante iti śrutidvayatātparyam //15//
GSP33brsgor4u:538: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā |
GSP33brsgor4u:543: tasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ nāḍīmukhaṃ tasya jvalanaṃ bhāviphalasphuraṇaṃ pradyotākhyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:547: atra pūrvapakṣe vidyākṛtātiśayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:549: yena kenacinmārgeṇa nirgatasyāpi brahmalokaprāptau vidyaśeṣatvena mārgānusmṛtividheḥ kevalādṛṣṭārthatvaṃ syādato 'nvahaṃ smṛtenaiva mārgeṇa gamanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:552: suṣumnākhyā nāḍī hṛdayāt nirgatā dakṣiṇākṣitālukaṇṭhāntastananāsikāmadhyābhittidvārā brahmarandhraṃ prāptā sūryaraśmibhirekīkṛtā brahmalokamārga upāsakasyeti sthitam //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:558: atha prārabdhānte etadutkramaṇaṃ yadā syādatha tadā etaireva nāḍīsaṃbaddhai raśmibhirutkrāmatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:566: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca |
GSP33brsgor4u:568: śirā nāḍyaḥ pratāyante vistṛtā bhavanti sṛptāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:572: kiñca yadi rātrau mṛtasya raśmiyogaṃ vinaivordhvagatiḥ syāttadā raśmiśruterdivāmṛtaviṣayatayā saṃkocaḥ syādūrdhvagatyabhāve ca vidyāyāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:578: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyane mṛto vidvānvidyāphalamāpnoti na veti vidyāyā nityavatphalaśruteruttarāyaṇaprāśastyaśāstrācca
GSP33brsgor4u:587: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite |
GSP33brsgor4u:591: yogī daharādyupāsaka eva smṛtyuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-smārte ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:592: bhagavadārādhanabuddhyānuṣṭhitaṃ karma yogaḥ 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:593: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:594: dhāraṇāpūrvako 'kartṛtvānubhavaḥ sāṃkhyaṃ, 'indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:598: yadi tu śrautārthapratyabhijñayā kālaśabdo devatāparastarhyaikārthyameveti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:601: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthadhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor4u:606: evamutkrāntiṃ nirūpya tatsādhyaṃ mārgaṃ gantavyaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:611: pūrvaṃ yadākadācinmṛtasyāpi phalaprāptiruktā tadvadyena kenacinmārgeṇa gatiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ vikalpaḥ, siddhānte mārgaikyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:613: kiñca mārgabhede satyasmādayaṃ mārgastvarayā prāpaka iti yuktaṃ na mārgaikya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:622: parāvato dīrghāyuṣo hiraṇyagarbhasya parā dīrghāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānvasanti kāryabrahmaṇo yā jitiḥ sarvatra jayaḥ, vyuṣṭirvyāptistāṃ labhata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:626: yathā laukikamārge vilambastathā arcirādau neti tvarāvacanopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:635: arcirādiṣvasmādayamanantara iti krameṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva ucyata ityadhikaraṇasya tātparyamuktvā viṣayamāha-sa etamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:637: sa kiṃ arcirātmakāgneranantaramuta saṃvatsarātpara iti pāṭhādvakṣyamāṇaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye siddhāntamevopakramate-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:638: puruṣaḥ upāsako 'smāllokāddehātpraiti nirgacchati tasmai prāptāya puruṣāya sa vāyustatra svātmani vijihīte chidraṃ karoti, tena vāyudattena rathacakrachidratulyena dvāreṇordhvamādityaṃ gacchatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:642: kāṇvānāṃ tu tenetyūrdhvamiti ca śabdābhyāṃ kramaniścayātpāṭhabādha iti siddhāntārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:644: vājiśrutisthe tu saṃvatsarasyāśruteḥ kathamabdātparo vāyurityata āha-vājeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:645: tarhi devalokādvāyumiti sūtraṃ syādityata āha-vāyumabdāditi tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:646: saṃvatsarasya māsāvayavitvānmāsānantaryaṃ saṃvatsarātparo devalokastataḥ paro vāyurvāyoḥ para āditya iti śrutidvaye kramo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:647: teneti tṛtīyāśrutyā vāyorādityapūrvatvāvagamāditi, sūtre tu vāyupadaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:652: evaṃ kauṣītakibhiragnyanantaraṃ paṭhitasya vāyoḥ sthānamuktvā vāyvanantaraṃ paṭhitasya varuṇasyārcirādimārge sthānamāha-taḍito 'dhi
GSP33brsgor4u:654: paṭhito varuṇādirmārgaparvatvena saṃbadhyate na veti saṃdehe 'rciṣo
GSP33brsgor4u:655: 'harityādi pañcamyārcirādīnāṃ krameṇa mārgaparvatayā baddhatvādvāyoriva sthānaviśeṣaśrutyabhāvādalabdhasthāno varuṇādirna saṃbadhyata iti prāpte
GSP33brsgor4u:658: varuṇasyābdvārā vidyusaṃbandhāt 'āgantukānāmante niveśaḥ'iti nyāyāycca vidyudānantarye sati yathāpāṭhamindraprajāpatyoḥ krama ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor4u:665: arcirādayo vidyudantāścetanā netāraścāmānavapurūṣeṇa netrā saha paṭhitatvāditi siddhāntayati-evamityādinā
GSP33brsgor4u:667: puruṣasyāmānavatvaṃ netṛtvaṃ cetyubhayaparatve vākyabhedaḥ syādato 'rcirādipadairnetāra eva mānavāḥ prakṛtāḥ prakaraṇabalādvidyudanantaraṃ mānavasya netuḥ prāptau prakaraṇaprāptanetṛtvānuvādenāmānavatvamekameva pratipādyata iti vaktavyamityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor4u:668: netṛprakaraṇānaṅgīkāre tvamānavaḥ puruṣo gamayatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta amānavatvavannetṛtvasyāpyaprāpteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:673: yadyanetāro 'cetanā evārcirādayastarhi mārgatadgantrorubhayorapi vyāmohādajñatvādūrdhvagatirna syādataḥ svayaṃ prayatnaśūnyaścetanāntareṇa neya iti laukikanyāyānugrahāttatsiddhernetṛtvasiddheruktaliṅgaṃ nyāyopedamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:675: arciraharādīnāmasthiratvādrātryādau mṛtasya pratīkṣā nāstītyuktatvācca na mārgacihnatvaṃ bhogyatvaṃ vā, devatātve tvasthiratvadoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:685: śrutyā varuṇādīnāṃ netṛtvābhāve 'pyanugrāhakatvena mārgāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //6//
GSP33brsgor4u:689: evaṃ mārgaṃ nirūpya gantavyaṃ cintayati-kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:690: paraṃ brahma gantavyamiti pūrvapakṣe mārgasya muktyarthatā kāryaṃ brahmeti siddhānte bhogārthateti matvā prathamaṃ siddhāntamāha-tatra kāryameveti /
GSP33brsgor4u:699: na cānāvṛttiliṅgātparasya gantavyatā, kramamuktyā liṅgasyānyathāsiddheriti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor4u:707: samaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrarūpavikārāvasāne brahmalokanivāsinaḥ kutātmānaḥ śuddhadhiyastatrotpannasamyagdhiyaḥ sarve brahmaṇā mucyamānena saha paraṃ padaṃ praviśantīti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor4u:708: evaṃ siddhāntamuktvā tena nirastaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-kaṃ punarityādinā //9 //
GSP33brsgor4u:712: daharavidyāyāṃ kaṭhavallīṣu parabrahmaprakaraṇe ca tayordhvamāyanniti gatirdarśitā //13//
GSP33brsgor4u:717: saṃprati prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prāpnuyāmiti upāsakasya maraṇakāle kāryaprāptisaṃkalpaśruterna paraṃ gantavyamiti śaṅkāṃ nirasyati-naca kārya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:719: yaśa ātmā brāhmaṇānāmahaṃ bhavāmi, tathā rājñāṃ yaśo viśāṃ yaśa iti
GSP33brsgor4u:721: astu veśmapratipattīcchā parabrahmaviṣayā tathāpi sā kathaṃ gatipūrvikā syādityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:722: tattatra brahmaloke vidyāvidhīnenāparājitā pūrasti brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasya tenaiva prabhuṇāṃ vimitaṃ nirmitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśmāsti tatpratipadyate vidvāniti daharavidyāyāṃ gatipūrvikā veśmaprāptiruktā /
GSP33brsgor4u:724: kiñca pada gatāviti dhātupāṭhādveśma prapadye ityatra mārgāpekṣā
GSP33brsgor4u:729: gantavyatvasya brahmalokeṣviti bahuvacanādeḥ saṃkalpādeva gandhādidivyabhogaśruteśca parabrahmaṇyasaṃbhavānmukhyārthatyāga
GSP33brsgor4u:730: yadyapyetadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahmetyādiśrutiṣu prayogasāmyādbrahmaśabda ubhayatra rūḍhatayā mukhyaḥeva tathāpi pūrṇe parasminnavayavārthasya niratiśayamahattvasya lābhādaparabrahmaṇyamukhya ityaṅgīkṛtamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:732: yathā vidyāsaṃbaddhasuṣumnāstutyarthaṃ tadasaṃbaddhanāḍyantarakīrtanaṃ tathā paravidyāstutyarthaṃ tatprakaraṇe 'pyaparavidyāśrayagatikīrtanaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:733: yujyate, gatiṃ vināpi hi paravidyā niratiśayaphalā tasyāṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:739: sarvagatasya svātmabhūtasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāradeśāddeśāntareṇa tatkālātkālāntareṇa viśiṣṭatayā gantavyatvaṃ syāditi pṛthivīvayodṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:741: nanu yuktaṃ bhūvayasoḥ prāptayorapi deśāntarakālāntaraviśiṣṭatvena gantavyatvaṃ tayorgantṛbhinnatvāt, brahmaṇastu gantrabhinnasya kathaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:743: yā prāptā bhūḥ sā na gantavyā yacca gantavyaṃ deśāntaraṃ tattvaprāptamiti kutaḥ prāptasya gantavyatā vayaso 'pi kālāntare 'bhivyaktimātraṃ na gantavyatvamiti vastugatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:744: aṅgīkṛtya viśiṣṭabhūvayasorgantavyatāṃ parabrahmaṇo deśakālavaiśiṣṭyābhāvānna kathañcidapi gantavyatetyāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:745: 'anādimatparaṃ brahma'ityādyā smṛtirdṛśyaviśeṣasya dṛśi kalpitatvāddṛgātmano nirviśeṣateti nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:746: saguṇameva brahma sūtrātmāpekṣayā paraṃ gantavyaṃ, nirviśeṣaṃ tu nāstyeveti śaṅkate-jagadutpattīti
GSP33brsgor4u:752: tāsāṃ svārthe phalavattvena nirākāṅkṣatvāccheṣitā viśeṣaśrutīnāṃ tvaphalatvānniṣedhyaviśeṣasamarpaṇādidvāreṇa śeṣatvaṃ phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamiti nyāyādityāha-ucyata ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:753: na kevalaṃ nyāyāccheṣatā kintu śrutyāpītyāha-pratyakṣaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:754: tatra mūlakāraṇe brahmaṇyetacchuṅgaṃ jagadātmakaṃ kāryamutpannamityupakramya tena śuṅgena tanmūlamanvicchetyupasaṃhāre sata eva jñeyatvamuktaṃ chāndogye /
GSP33brsgor4u:755: tathā taittirīyake 'pi jagajjanmādyanuvādena brahmaṇa eva jñeyatvaṃ darśitamataḥ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ śrutyaiva nirviśeṣadhīśeṣatā bhātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:758: evaṃ gantavyālocanayā gatiṃ nirasya gantrālocanayāpi nirasyati-gatikalpanāyāṃ cetyādinā
GSP33brsgor4u:763: vikārāvayavarūpajīvaviśiṣṭasyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthiratvājjīvānāṃ gatyāgatī na syātām /
GSP33brsgor4u:769: bhinnayorabhedo mukhyo na yukto virodhāditi pariharati-neti /
GSP33brsgor4u:770: kiñca pakṣatrayamapyayuktaṃ saṃsāritvasya tāttvikajīvabhāvasya nāśe tāttvivajīvasvarūpanāśaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsgor4u:771: nacāsmābhiriva tvayā brahmātmatvaṃ jīvasya tāttvikarūpamaṅgīkṛtaṃ yadasya saṃsāranāśe 'pi na naśyedityāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:772: nanu kiṃ brahmatvena, saṃsārābhāvaḥ kila mokṣaḥ sa ca karmābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor4u:777: nanu tavāpyetattarkamātramekasmiñjanmanyanekaviruddhaphalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhogāyogādastyavaśiṣṭaṃ karma janmāntarasya nimittamityāśaṅkya tatra mānamāha-karmaśeṣasadbhāvasiddhiśceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:778: santvanārabdhaphalāni puṇyapāpāni teṣāṃ nityādyanuṣṭhānena kṣayānna janmāntaramiti śaṅkate-syādetaditi
GSP33brsgor4u:780: pāpasyāpi sarvātmanā puṇyanāśyatve mānaṃ nāstīti saṃcitapuṇyapāpābhyāṃ janmāntaraṃ durvāramityāha-tannetyādinā
GSP33brsgor4u:781: kriyamāṇanityādināpi janma syāt, karmaṇā pitṛloka ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:783: pratyavāyanirāsārthe nityādyācāre satyanu paścātphalāntaraṃ niṣpadyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:787: jñānaṃ vinā dehapāte mokṣa eveti niścayālābhāttvatpakṣe kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:788: brahmabhinnasya jīvasyaṃ kartṛtvādisvabhāvasya mokṣāśāpi na yuktetyāha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:789: kartṛtvādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ na svabhāvaḥ kintu tacchaktiriti
GSP33brsgor4u:791: kāryagamyāyāḥ śakteḥ kāryasyātyantānutpāde sattvamayuktamataḥ śaktisattve tadviṣayasya kāryasyādṛṣṭadeśakālādinimittānāṃ cātmanā śaktidvārā nityasaṃbaddhatvānmokṣo na syāditi pariharati-taccetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:806: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca |
GSP33brsgor4u:811: idānīmapatīkopāsakānāmeva mārgo na sarveṣāṃ vikāropāsakānāmityubhayathābhāvoktau pūrvoktavirodhaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:814: aniyamaḥ sarvāsāmiti sūtre sarvaśabdasya pratīkopāsakānyaparatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:815: yadyapi pratīkadhyāyināṃ pitṛyāṇatṛtīyasthānayorapraveśādarcirādimārgo vācyastathāpi teṣāṃ vidyutparyantameva gamanamastu na brahmaprāptirbrahmakratutvābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:816: yo yat dhyāyati sa tatprāpnoti hi tatkratunyāyaḥ śrutimūlaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:817: pratīkeṣu ca nāmādiṣu dhyeyeṣu brahmaṇo guṇatvāt, na brahmadhyāyitvamasti /
GSP33brsgor4u:818: asya ca nyāyasya pañcāgnividyāyāmāhatyavādātpratyakṣavacanādbādha iṣṭa iti sūtrabhāṣyārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:824: tasmādasati vacane brahmadhyāyina eva brahmagantāra iti siddham //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:832: pūrvapāde brahmopāsakānāṃ kāryabrahmaprāptiruktā, saṃprati teṣāmaiśvaryaviśeṣaṃ brāhmalaukikaṃ pādasyottarārdhena prapañcayiṣyannādāvabhyarhitaparavidyāprāpyaṃ nirviśeṣabrahmabhāvamāha-saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svenaśabdāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:834: pūrvapakṣe mokṣasya svargādaviśeṣaḥ, siddhānte viśeṣa iti phalaṃ, tatra mokṣa āgantukaḥ, phalatvātsvargavaditi nyāyopetayābhiniṣpattiśrutyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kimityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:835: svaśabdaśrutibādhito nyāyaḥ abhiniṣpattiśca sākṣātkāravṛttyabhiprāyā bandhadhvaṃsajanmanyaupacārikveveti matvā siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:836: mokṣasya phalatvena prāptāgantukatvanirāsārthaḥ svaśabda iti yuktaṃ svīyavācitve 'tvanarthakānuvādaḥ syādityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:841: jāgarite hyāndhyādidehadharmavānbhavati svapne tu hata eva kenacit /
GSP33brsgor4u:842: apica putrādināśādroditīva bhavati, suṣuptau tu viśeṣājñānādvinaṣṭa iveti,
GSP33brsgor4u:843: bandhadaśāyāṃ kaluṣitātmanā tiṣṭhati mokṣe tu vigalitākhiladuḥkhaḥ paritaḥ pradyotamānapūrṇānandātmanāvatiṣṭhata iti mahān viśeṣa ityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor4u:849: kāryaṃ prāpto 'pi muktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na cānativṛtta iti //3//
GSP33brsgor4u:854: svarūpasthitamuktamupajīvya vādivivādāt brahmabhedābhedasaṃśaye satyatyantabhedaṃ pūrvapakṣamuktvā siddhāntamāha-yasyeti //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:858: brāhmeṇa jaiminiḥuktaṃ brahma svarūpamupajīvya sa kiṃ satyena sarvajñatvādidharmeṇa yuktastiṣṭhati uta dharmasya śaśaśṛṅgavadatyantāsattvāccinmātrātmanā tiṣṭhati kiṃ vā vastutaścinmātro 'pi jīvāntaravyavahāradṛṣṭyā kalpitasarvajñatvādimāniti munivipratipatteḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:864: sarvajña ityādistu vyapadeśo 'yaṃ hi noddeśaḥ vidhyabhāvānnāpi vidhiḥ siddhavannirdeśādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:869: citiścaitanyaṃ, śabdajñānādyo vikalpo 'sanpratyayastajjāḥ atyantāsanta iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:872: cinmātre mukte jakṣaṇādiśrutiḥ kathaṃ tatrāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:876: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ |
GSP33brsgor4u:881: ye īśvaradharmāsta eva cidātmani mukte jīvāntarairvyavahriyante iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:882: naca mūlāvidyaikyāttannāśe kuto jīvāntaramiti vācyaṃ, na vayaṃ tannāśe
GSP33brsgor4u:885: tarhi nānavidyāpakṣa eva kuto nādriyate jīvabhedasyāvaśyakatvāditi cet /
GSP33brsgor4u:887: prakṛtinānātvaṃ pratijīvaṃ prapañcabheda ityādyaprāmāṇikānekārthagauravāditi sarvavṛddhasaṃmata ekāvidyāpakṣa eva
GSP33brsgor4u:896: na caivakāravirodhaḥ saṃkalpena sāmagryā ayogavyavacchedena saulabhyārthatvāt, yatnānaṅgīkāre bhogapuṣṭyasiddheśceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:897: atra lokavṛttānusaraṇaṃ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu vidyābalena saṃkalpasyaiva bhogapuṣṭikaratvasiddhiriti bedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:898: kiñca yadi bhogasaṃkalpānantaramapi yatnāntarasādhyanimittāpekṣā syāttarhi nimittaprāpteḥ prāgjātasaṃkalpasya vandhyatvaṃ syādbhoge vilambāttataḥ satyasaṃkalpaśruterna yatnāntarāpekṣetyāha-nimittāntaramapi tviti //8//
GSP33brsgor4u:904: īśvaradharma eva viduṣyāvirbhūta iti na saṃkalpabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ //9//
GSP33brsgor4u:911: atrāpi vādivivādātsaṃśayaḥ, tatra dehādayo na santyeva sadā santyeveti ca pakṣadvayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:912: kālabhedenecchayā santi na santi ceti siddhāntapakṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:922: satratvaṃ, āsateti copayantīti vā coditatvaṃ satralakṣaṇamiti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:923: tathā dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanādarśanānniyatakartṛkatvāvagamena dvirātrādivadahīnatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ //12 // //13 // //14//
GSP33brsgor4u:933: sa ekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādiśrutyā viduṣa evānekadhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:939: liṅgasya tu dehabhedakṛto bhedo na svataḥ, svato liṅgabhede tadupahitajīvabhedādanusaṃdhānānupapatteḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:941: tathāpi pradīpatvajātyaikyena vyaktiṣvaikyāropāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:942: tathāca yathā pradīpo 'naikavartiṣu praviśati evaṃ vidyāyogabalādvidvaliṅgasya vyāpitvādanekadeheṣu yugapadāveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:945: yadanādi mana ekadehasthaṃ tadanusārīṇi dehāntarasthāpi manāṃsi bhavanti tadavasthānāṃ tanniyamyatvasaṃbhavāditi
GSP33brsgor4u:947: nirmāṇacittānyasmitāmātrātpravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittamekamanekeṣāmiti hi bhagavatpatañjalinā sūtritam /
GSP33brsgor4u:956: evaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimuktyanyatarāpekṣaṃ saguṇopāsakasya bhogoktau na virudhyate bhinnaviṣayatvādityāha-svāpyayeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:959: atra samutthānādivākyaṃ muktiviṣayaṃ yatra suptā iti suptiviṣayamiti vibhāgaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:966: īśvaranānātvaṃ pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tu vidyāyogināmīśvaraniyamyatvādekasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasyaiva jagatkartṛtvasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:967: pralayātsargasamaye yasyekṣaṇapūrvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śrutau prakṛtaṃ tasyaiva niyantṛtvādirjagadvyāpāraḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:973: ekaṃ pratyanyeṣāṃ guṇatve tveka eveśvara ityāha-samanaskatvāditi //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:977: adhikāre niyojayatyādityādīnityādhikārikaḥ, sa cāsau maṇḍalasthaśca tasya prāpyatvokterityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:978: manasaspatiḥ sūryamaṇḍalāntaḥsthaḥ paramātmā 'tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi
GSP33brsgor4u:980: tathāca yadi pūrvaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ svārājyamuktaṃ syāttarhi īśvarasyāgre prāpyatāṃ na brūyāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:981: ato bhoge svārājyaṃ na jagajjanmādiṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:986: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha |
GSP33brsgor4u:993: yathā jñānābhāvānnirguṇaṃ na prāptaṃ tathā dhyānābhāvājjagatsraṣṭṛtvādi na prāpyate /
GSP33brsgor4u:998: tamupāsakaṃ brahmalokagatamāha-hiraṇyagarbhaḥ mayā khalvimā āpo amṛtarūpā mīyante bhujyante tavāpyasau loko 'mṛtodakalakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1010: bādarāyaṇapadena badarikāśramavāsoktyā nityasarvajñasya paramagurornārāyaṇasya prasādadyotanāttapraṇītaśāstre niravadyatāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33brsgor4u:1013: ye brahmalokaṃ gacchanti te taṃ prāpya nāvartante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1015: ito 'smātpṛthivīlokāttṛtīyasyāṃ divi yo brahmalokastasminnara iti ṇya iti
GSP33brsgor4u:1017: airamannamayaṃ, madīyaṃ madakaraṃ saraḥ, somasavanaḥ amṛtavarṣī /
GSP33brsgor4u:1018: yadyapi teṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirimaṃ mānavamiti ca śrutiṣvihemamiti viśeṣaṇādasminkalpe brahmalokaṃ gatānāṃ kalpāntare āvṛttirbhāti,
GSP33brsgor4u:1019: tathāpīśvaropāstiṃ vinā pañcāganividyāśvamedhadṛḍhabrahmacaryādisādhanairye gatāsteṣāṃ tattvajñānaniyamābhāvādāvṛttiḥ syāt, ye tu daharādīśvaropāstyā gatāsteṣāṃ saguṇavidyāphalakṣaye 'pi niravagraheśvarānugrahalabdhātmajñānānmuktiriti niyama ityabhipretyāha-antavattve 'pi tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1020: nanvatra sūtrakṛtā saguṇavidāmevānāvṛttikrama ukto na nirguṇavidāṃ tatra ko heturityāśaṅkya teṣāmāvṛttiśaṅkābhāvādityāha-samyagiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1022: saguṇavidāmāvṛttiprāptau samyagdarśanāśrayaṇenaivānāvṛttiḥ sādhitā, ataḥ svata eva samyagdarśināmāvṛttiśaṅkā neti kimu vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1023: yatrādhyāyasamāptistatra padamātrasyābhyāso darśitaḥ, iha sūtrasyaivābhyāsācchāstrasamāptirdyetyata ityāha-anāvṛttiḥ śabdāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:1024: evaṃ samanvayoktyā brahmātmaikyasya vedāntapramāṇakatvamavadhārayituṃ vākyārthajñāne smṛtitarkādisarvaprakāravirodhaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:1028: śārīkasya bhāṣyasya kṛtā vyākhyā satāṃ mude //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:1031: vakṣasyakṣṇośca pārśve karatalayugale kaustubhābhāṃ dayāṃ ca sītāṃ kodaṇḍadīkṣāmabhayavarayutāṃ vīkṣya rāmāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1032: svasyāḥ kva syāditīyaṃ hṛdi kṛtamananā bhāṣyaratnaprabhākhyā,
GSP33brsgor4u:1034: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgopālasarasvatīpūjyapādaśi ṣyaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // iti caturthasyādhyāyasya brahmaprāpti-brahmalokasthitinirūpaṇākhyaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ //
